mapper.select: select * from music order by id desc
mapper.insert: insert into music(title, artist, genre, release_date, cover_url) values (#{title}, #{artist}, #{genre}, #{releaseDate}, #{coverUrl})
mapper.update: update music set title = #{title}, artist = #{artist}, genre = #{genre}, release_date = #{releaseDate}, cover_url = #{coverUrl} where id = #{id}
